thread.section_title: Auto Europe Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe Canada | autoeurope.ca
thread.title: Derek Stewart
thread.title_full: Auto Europe Canada reviewed by Derek Stewart

author: Derek Stewart
title: Derek Stewart
text:
Very easy to use and seems reliable. Lots of locations for pick up and drop off.
This site would be extremely easier to use if the locations for drop off and pick up were detailed on a map. Very time consuming copying and pasting addresses into maps to see what the best location would be. Especially as a visiting tourist where locations in a different language are so unknown to me.
I did also have an issue with the site telling me that a pick up location was unavailable even though it showed the location to be open at that time. But I worked through it and hopefully everything works out fine.
Derek
